General.Name: Nanjing Central Emporium Group Stocks Co Ltd
General.Description: Nanjing Central Emporium (Group) Stocks Co., Ltd. operates department stores. The company retails daily necessities, food, cigarettes, cigar, health food, needle textiles, clothing, shoes and hats, stationery, sporting goods, sports equipment, first-class medical equipment, mechanical equipment, Wujinjiaodian, electronic products, household appliances, furniture, decoration materials, mineral products, building materials, and chemical products. It also engages in the development, production, and sales of high-tech products; e-commerce; and designing and producing various domestic advertisements, as well as provides parking lot services. The company is also involved in the real estate development and management; site leasing; property management; hairdressing; and indoor entertainment activities, as well as self-management and agency of import and export business of various commodities and technologies. The company was founded in 1936 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.
